name: Microphones and Moonsaults
description:
YOU ARE A HOT NEW WRESTLING FACTION.

You goal is to “get over”, whatever that may mean to you as a player and as a group. This could mean winning belts, becoming the baddest group of dudes, winning the hearts of the crowd or retiring with dignity, or anything else you could imagine.

Based off Lasers and Feelings by John Harper, remixed under a CC BY 4.0 license.
creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0
